jd: From: saiprakash, RITWIK Infotech saiprakash@ritwikinfotech.com Reply to: saiprakash@ritwikinfotech.com Job Title: Java Integration LeadLocation – Remote (Client is in Pittsburgh, PA/EST)Duration: 6 to 12 Months Note from the client - Looking for someone with lead experience in retail (highly preferable) and expertise in Java and Spring Boot to lead a team of 2-5 developers. The role also involves coordinating with cross-functional teams, including Product, Solution Architecture, and Business teams, to ensure alignment and successful project delivery.
